meanings.definition: A brief stay during a journey.
meanings.sent1: During our road trip, we made a quick stopoff at the gas station to refuel.
meanings.sent2: The airport was our final destination, but we had a short stopoff in Chicago.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected stopoff at the ice cream parlor made the kids very happy.
meanings.sent4: His visit to the library was just a quick stopoff on his way to the bookstore.
meanings.sent5: The cozy cafe became our favorite stopoff spot on the way home.
